mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_edu.t_bedu_history( user_name, lect_dtl_num, history_start_time, history_end_time ) VALUES( #{userName}, #{lectDtlNum}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE history_end_time = #{endTime}
mapper.select: SELECT history_num as num, user_name as userName, lect_dtl_num as lectDtlNum, history_start_time as startTime, history_end_time as endTime, complete as complete FROM b_edu.t_bedu_history WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND LECT_DTL_NUM = #{lectDtlNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE B_EDU.T_BEDU_HISTORY SET COMPLETE = #{complete} WHERE user_name = #{userName} AND lect_dtl_num = #{lectDtlNum}
